body_html:
Hi, I'm also interested in this feature, are there any plans/volunteers for adding this feature soon?
I was also wondering, is back-propagation possible through the nearest neighbor interpolation method?

body:
Hi, I'm also interested in this feature, are there any plans/volunteers for adding this feature soon?
I was also wondering, is back-propagation possible through the nearest neighbor interpolation method?
